description:
1885. 

A top-down STG (Shoot'Em'Up) game. Created in Unity 2D.

Instructions:

Move & Navigation -  [W] [A] [S] D] / [↑  ↓  ← →]

Shoot - [Space Bar]

Buy Upgrades - [E]

Confirm - [Enter]

Pause - [Escape]

Recommended Play Environment:

1. Full Screen

2. Enable Hardware Acceleration (Browser)

Author: Jason Kwok , 2019
